title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin's Wild Card Weekend Reaction and Cowboys Final Play Disaster, McCarthy Future with Matt Mosley
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin's Wild Card Weekend Reaction and Cowboys Final Play Disaster, McCarthy Future with Matt Mosley
description:
Colin lays into Dak and Jimmy G for their bonehead decisions, explains why the Bengals will run out of gas and why he won't be shocked if Belichick trades Mac Jones and the Eagles opt for a better QB than Jalen Hurts (3:00). Then, longtime Dallas Cowboys writer - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley joins Colin post-game from AT&T Stadium to discuss the wild ending to the Niners/Cowboys game. They cover the misguided run by Dak (12:00), the officiating mess (14:00), if Jerry Jones should fire Mike McCarthy to keep Kellen Moore (14:00), what fixes they should make in the offseason (22:00), looking back at Dak's season as a whole (25:00), and why the Cowboys' 12-5 regular season record was so misleading (26:00).

Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
